p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Adds an `is object` filter clause onto a query
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Adds a `is object` predicate to the given query. This predicate indicates to the query to filter out the objects that are not part of the given list of this brick.
Notice that it can be a simple unique object, an array of objects or even tags (string unique identifiers of objects).
The query to which the `is object` filter must be added
The query including the `is object` filter

The list of objects or the single object that the query should look for keeping as a valid result. It can be a single object, a list of objects or a single tag or list of tags. `tags` being strings, unique identifiers of objects.
